name: Godot Free Examples and Starter Projects
name_original: Godot Free Examples and Starter Projects
description:
Hello Guys, My name is Adel Laggoune ( DzOneManArmy ), i'm an Indie game developer from Algeria, i use Godot and i worked on many Projects using that Engine.
In this page i'm going to release Godot 3 and Godot 4 Projects and Examples i made for you guys to help you understand the Engine better and start making your games with this Amazing game engine.

You can Also visit my Youtube Channel for Future tutorials/ tips and tricks for Godot whenever i find a chance for that : My Youtube Channel
and this is my Twitter : https://twitter.com/DzOneManArmy


These Projects and Examples are 100% Free and under MIT License, But you can support me by paying what you want, or buy me a coffee : Buy me a Coffee
This will encourage and help me doing more examples and tutorials for guys !

And i almost forgot, BTW i came from Unreal Engine Background, so the code you are going to see is in PascalCase, not in snake_case, also i use ; in the end of each line of code. and i use letter : b before any boolean variable name.
but don't worry if you don't like this style of code, i'm going to release both PascalCase and sneak_case versions of the same Example, or maybe we can agree on a style and see what do you prefer guys!
